original_title: 僕の彼女が不在中に押しに弱そうな早漏妹とこっそりハメまくった同棲中の7日間 八木奈々
overview: Exclusive 4th edition! First challenge to Nana Yagi drama! My house had no electricity or gas, so I decided to stay at her house for a while. She has a younger sister, and I'm meeting her for the first time, but... she seems to be wary of me, sticking her face out of her back. “Nice to meet you, Nana,” said her little sister in a shy voice. title: While My Girlfriend Was Away, I Secretly Spent The Next 7 Days Fucking Her Prematurely Ejaculating Little Sister Nana Yagi
